text:
Tarek El Moussa is ready to show off his new bachelor pad! The Flip or Flop star purchased a new home this spring, right around the time the mansion he shared with ex-wife Christina El Moussa went on the market for $3 million (and sold within a month).

"It's so amazing to FINALLY have a home....a real home for me and my babies," Tarek, who split from Christina in 2016, captioned an Instagram photo of the page in People where his Costa Mesa, CA, house tour appeared. "It's nice to have stability and call a place home after all these years. Brayden loves his race car themed room and Taylor loves her Mermaid room!!"

It was love at first sight for the HGTV host, who wasn't actively looking for a new home, let alone one in that location, when he initially came across it. "I was randomly driving down a street and saw this place and I knew it was the one!" he shared on Instagram.

Click through the photos below to see inside, pre-renovation.

"I walked in, and it had the absolute coolest bachelor-pad-meets-family-house vibes," he told People.

Hours later, he was putting in an offer, leaving him with an important lesson: "If you want something go get it, go after it and never quit!" he wrote on social media. "This relates to life in general..if there is something you want take action!!! My ❤️❤️❤️ Babies finally get a home with daddy!!!"

The purchase apparently came in under budget at $2.28 million, and though he loved it as-is, he couldn't resist the opportunity to make it his own. "I did floor to ceiling wallpaper as an accent wall," he wrote in a sneak peek on Instagram, "how cool is that!?"

The 4-bedroom, 3.5-bathroom house looks completely different from the one he shared with Christina—although it too features a living room that opens up to a luxurious outdoor pool. And that kitchen! Simply swoonworthy.



In the current season of Flip or Flop, Tarek has been more involved in the design process than ever, and his new property gave him the perfect opportunity to flex those muscles once more, right down to the furnishings. "I had nothing," Tarek told People. "When I left, I left. So I got to design and build most of the furniture."

That includes an 8 ft.-by-8 ft. bed, but don't get any ideas: He's single right now and created the custom piece with cuddles with his kids in mind.

Tarek knows at least one of his neighbors: Christina now lives only two blocks away. "I'm like, 'Get out of my neighborhood!'" Tarek joked to E! after Christina, too, snatched up a home in Newport Beach, which she'll renovate as part of her new solo show, Christina on the Coast. The series will also focus on Christina's personal life; she has been dating boyfriend Ant Anstead for nine months.

The proximity could prove useful as the former couple continues to co-parent their two kids, Taylor and Brayden.

"I'm am [sic] so excited for my 'new beginnings' ... sometimes things are meant to be:)," the celebrity realtor shared after purchasing the property.

(h/t: People)
